title: Toyota Corolla 1.8 Hybrid (2019) – Hatchback
description: Well-maintained compact hybrid with automatic transmission, modern safety features, and low running costs. Ideal for city and commuting.

title: Kawasaki Ninja 650 (2018) – Sport Motorcycle
description: Lightweight, agile middleweight with ABS and upright ergonomics. Great for daily rides and weekend trips.
